text: Piche rahi jane vale pendu'am nu akho, ki jaladi hi tusim ajihe lokam vala sade ja'oge jihare bare takatavara hana. Tusim unham nala larauge jam uha isalama li'a'unage. So jekara tusim hukama manoge tam alaha tuhanu bahuta vadhi'a fala devega ate jekara tusim muha moronge jivem ki isa tom pahilam muha mora cuke ho tam uha (alaha) tuhanu daradanaka saza devega
